objects.text:
• 925 Sterling Silver
• Rose Gold Plated
• Certificate of Authenticity
• 6 Month Warranty
Perfect gift for girlfriend, wife, women & girls

product_details.name: GIVA 925 Sterling Silver Rose Gold Pink Drop Wreath Studs | Gift for Girlfriend Wife Women & Girls | With Certificate of Authenticity and 925 Stamp | 6 Month Warranty*

- Department: womens.
- Item Weight: 3.9 g.

- Net Quantity: 2.00 count.
- Generic Name: Stud Earrings.
- Customer Reviews: 4.6 4.6 out of 5 stars 69 ratings.

banner_details:
This elegant promotional banner is divided into four soft-toned quadrants, forming a cohesive, luxurious design. The top-left quadrant features two bold uppercase text layers ("heading_1" and "heading_2") aligned left, styled in a high-contrast serif font reflecting sophistication. Beneath them, a soft sans-serif subheading ("subheading") adds a concise product descriptor. The top-right quadrant showcases a centered jewelry product image ("product_image") with rose gold and diamond elements.

The bottom-left includes a features list ("description"), pricing info ("price"), and a bold call-to-action ("cta") over a rounded rectangle button ("cta_button"). The bottom-right emphasizes emotional appeal with a handwritten-style tagline ("tagline"), recipient description ("description_2"), and branding ("brand_name").

**Color Palette:**
- Rose Mist (#FDF4F5)
- Blush Pink (#FBE4E6)
- Petal Pink (#F7D1D4)
- Dusty Rose (#F5D0D3)
- Coral Rose (#F9BCB9)
- Deep Rose (#A93855)
- Warm Plum (#7D3049)
- White (#FFFFFF)
product_color: The earrings in the image feature a delicate and feminine color palette centered around soft rose gold (#F6B2B2), complemented by shimmering clear crystals (#FFFFFF) and translucent marquise stones with a hint of cool gray (#D6D6D6). The rose gold forms the base structural elements, blending smoothly with the pale pink enamel in the floral motif, creating a seamless gradient. The crystals act as vibrant highlights, reflecting light to enhance sparkle and elegance. The color harmony is both luxurious and subtle, perfect for a banner backdrop with pastel tones like blush pink (#FADADD) or a minimal off-white (#FAFAFA) to emphasize the product's charm.
